data.prayer: Father, help the 3,567 believers in Prachuap Khiri Khan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 548,133 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Prachuap Khiri Khan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Prachuap Khiri Khan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
God, we pray for the believers in Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, help the people of Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, cause the 3,567 believers in Prachuap Khiri Khan to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
